_S.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

Statement.description: A document used to report the status of orders, billing, and payment. This document is a statement of account, not a summary invoice.

Statement.title: Statement. Details
Statement.description: A document used to report the status of orders, billing, and payment. This document is a statement of account, not a summary invoice.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Statement. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Statement. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Statement. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Statement. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Statement. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Statement. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Statement. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Statement. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Statement. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Statement. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

DocumentCurrencyCode.title: Statement. Document_ Currency Code. Code
DocumentCurrencyCode.description: The default currency for the Statement.

TotalDebitAmount.title: Statement. Total_ Debit Amount. Amount
TotalDebitAmount.description: The total of all debit amounts for the Statement.

TotalCreditAmount.title: Statement. Total_ Credit Amount. Amount
TotalCreditAmount.description: The total of all credit amounts for the Statement.

TotalBalanceAmount.title: Statement. Total_ Balance Amount. Amount
TotalBalanceAmount.description: The total amount for the Statement.

LineCountNumeric.title: Statement. Line Count. Numeric
LineCountNumeric.description: The number of Statement Lines in the Statement.

StatementTypeCode.title: Statement. Statement Type Code. Code
StatementTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of the Statement.

StatementPeriod.title: Statement. Statement_ Period. Period
StatementPeriod.description: A period to which the Statement applies.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Statement. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Statement. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

AccountingSupplierParty.title: Statement. Accounting_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

AccountingCustomerParty.title: Statement. Accounting_ Customer Party. Customer Party

BuyerCustomerParty.title: Statement. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

SellerSupplierParty.title: Statement. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

OriginatorCustomerParty.title: Statement. Originator_ Customer Party. Customer Party

PaymentTerms.title: Statement. Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.description: A set of payment terms associated with this document.

AllowanceCharge.title: Statement. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: A discount or charge that applies to a price component.

TaxTotal.title: Statement. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: The total amount of a specific type of tax.
